content: lion brand pattern # 70089 corrections applied jan 17 2013 jazz article #105 *discontinued* 980 yards crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 16 sts + 8 row = 6 in 15 cm in pattern work 25-row pattern crochet 1-round edging to finish search for other lion brand half moon crochet shawl patterns 1 on ravelry 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#craft=crochet&query=half%20moon&page=1&website=lionbrand com&sort=name&popcorn=shawl-wrap&view=captioned_thumbs
